replies.msg:
琴日去買料
而家差底板，散熱同 火牛未買

-MSI MPG Z390 GAMING PRO CARBON AC ATX
-MSI MPG Z390 GAMING EDGE AC ATX
邊款好用d？
職員叫我換ASUS品牌既底板 我猶豫左

火牛方面
-Antec NeoEco Gold Series 750W 80Plus Gold Semi Modular
-Thermaltake Toughpower GF1 ARGB 750W 80 Plus Gold TT Premium Edition Fully Modular
邊款好用d？

散熱方面
-Be Quiet! Dark Rock Pro 4 CPU Cooler
-Noctua NH-U12A 120mm Premium CPU Cooler with Two High-Performance Quiet NF-A12x25 PWM Fans
邊款好d？

我手頭上有既硬件
1 x Intel® Core™ i7-9700k

1 x ADATA XPG SPECTRIX D60G (2 X 8GB) DDR4 3600MHZ C17 RGB — TITANIUM

1 x MSI GeForce RTX 2070 SUPER GAMING X TRIO 8GB GDDR6

1 x Antec NX Series NX1000 Tempered Glass RGB Gaming ATX Case


麻煩曬

Pro Carbon 定位略高 EDGE 少少
全模vs半模
nh-u12a 好似效果強啲又矮身少少

俾我就
- z390 pro carbon
- GF1
- nh-u12a
